Publish on your own for $10 per month:
- Get maximum profits - Keep 95% of the revenue on orders for your book
- Keep your customers - Stop giving your customers away to Amazon and iTunes
- Real-time stats - Track your sales, visitors and the reading of your book
- ebook conversion - Automated conversion to standard ePub, PDF and Kindle formats
- Custom promo page - Customize colors and graphics for your book's promo page
- Single-use codes - ebook codes for giveaways, review copies or download cards

Reading across devices:
- No app required - readers don't need to download additional apps or use a specific platform
- Instant reading - readers can start reading your ebook directly on their tablet or smartphone
- ebook files - additionally provide ebook files for your readers to open in their favorite reading app

Simple and secure ordering:
- Sell with a link - share and sell by providing a link to your book's promo page
- Order processing - easy order process for readers to pay in one step and start reading in the next
- Pay-what-you-want - get more readers by allowing them to choose what to pay

Various ways to share your ebook:
- Widget - embed a custom sales widget and accept payments directly
- Share and save - readers can share across platforms and save for reading later

Get started for free!
